parameters.subject: BLKOUT NXT - Organiser Resources: Getting Started
parameters.text:
=Dear {{ $json.firstName }},

Thank you for being part of the BLKOUT NXT community as a QTIPOC Organiser!

As promised, we're sharing a series of resources to support your work. This first email focuses on getting started with community organizing.

Key Resources:
1. Community Organizing Basics: https://example.com/organizing-basics
2. Event Planning Checklist: https://example.com/event-checklist
3. Inclusive Space Guidelines: https://example.com/inclusive-spaces

We'll send you more specialized resources over the coming weeks. If you have specific questions or needs, feel free to reply to this email.

Best regards,
The BLKOUT NXT Team
